title.bibl: Lietuva, Vol. VIII, No. 26, June 29, 1900. Lithuanian Graduated in Enginerring Course

div.bibl: Lietuva, Vol. VIII, No. 26, June 29, 1900. LITHUANIAN GRADUATED IN ENGINERRING COURSE

body.p: Stanislawas Dowiath, brother of the well-known Lithuanian doctor, Mary Dowiath, graduated from the University of Illinois at Champaign ,June 1st. He received a diploma of engineer. He came with his parents as a student from Vilno Gymnaisum high School. He went to public school and after one year he passed the examination and went to high school. Then he went to the University. Now he came back as engineer.
